.table baseEdge
----
text/plain

edge{from: F, to: T} :-
  baseEdge{from: F, to: T} |
  baseEdge{from: F, to: I} & edge{from: I, to: T}.
----
text/propagation-log

.rulegraph
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "0" [fillcolor="moccasin" label="0: Union []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "1" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="1: Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: T}; {}) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "2" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="2: Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: I}; {}) [I]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "3" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="3: Match(edge{from: I, to: T}; {F: I, T: T}) [I]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "4" [fillcolor="thistle" label="4: Join(edge, [I]) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "baseEdge" [fillcolor="darksalmon" label="baseEdge:  []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "edge" [fillcolor="lightblue" label="edge: Subst({from: F, to: T}) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "0" -> "edge" [];
  "1" -> "0" [];
  "2" -> "4" [];
  "3" -> "4" [];
  "4" -> "0" [];
  "baseEdge" -> "1" [];
  "baseEdge" -> "2" [];
  "edge" -> "3" [];
}

baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
----
text/propagation-log
baseEdge from null: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {}. 
  baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {}
1 from baseEdge: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {}. Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: T}; {})
  baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}
2 from baseEdge: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {}. Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: I}; {})
  baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", I: "B"}
0 from 1: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}. Union
  baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}
4 from 2: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", I: "B"}. Join(edge, [I])
edge from 0: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}. Subst({from: F, to: T})
  edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}
3 from edge: edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}. Match(edge{from: I, to: T}; {F: I, T: T})
  edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {I: "A", T: "B"}
4 from 3: edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {I: "A", T: "B"}. Join(edge, [I])

baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
----
text/propagation-log
baseEdge from null: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {}. 
  baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {}
1 from baseEdge: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {}. Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: T}; {})
  baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}
2 from baseEdge: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {}. Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: I}; {})
  baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", I: "D"}
0 from 1: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}. Union
  baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}
4 from 2: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", I: "D"}. Join(edge, [I])
edge from 0: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}. Subst({from: F, to: T})
  edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}
3 from edge: edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}. Match(edge{from: I, to: T}; {F: I, T: T})
  edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {I: "C", T: "D"}
4 from 3: edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {I: "C", T: "D"}. Join(edge, [I])

baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
----
text/propagation-log
baseEdge from null: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {}. 
  baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {}
1 from baseEdge: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {}. Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: T}; {})
  baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}
2 from baseEdge: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {}. Match(baseEdge{from: F, to: I}; {})
  baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C"}
0 from 1: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}. Union
  baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}
4 from 2: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C"}. Join(edge, [I])
  edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}
edge from 0: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}. Subst({from: F, to: T})
  edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}
0 from 4: edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}. Union
  edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}
3 from edge: edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}. Match(edge{from: I, to: T}; {F: I, T: T})
  edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {I: "B", T: "C"}
edge from 0: edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}. Subst({from: F, to: T})
  edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}
4 from 3: edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {I: "B", T: "C"}. Join(edge, [I])
  edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}
3 from edge: edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}. Match(edge{from: I, to: T}; {F: I, T: T})
  edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {I: "B", T: "D"}
0 from 4: edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}. Union
  edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}
4 from 3: edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {I: "B", T: "D"}. Join(edge, [I])
  edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}
edge from 0: edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}. Subst({from: F, to: T})
  edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}
0 from 4: edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}. Union
  edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}
3 from edge: edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}. Match(edge{from: I, to: T}; {F: I, T: T})
  edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {I: "A", T: "C"}
edge from 0: edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}. Subst({from: F, to: T})
  edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}
4 from 3: edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {I: "A", T: "C"}. Join(edge, [I])
3 from edge: edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}. Match(edge{from: I, to: T}; {F: I, T: T})
  edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {I: "A", T: "D"}
4 from 3: edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {I: "A", T: "D"}. Join(edge, [I])

edge{from: F, to: T}.
----
application/datalog
edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}.
edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "B", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {F: "A", T: "C"}.
edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.
